name: AWP Town
tagline: AWP Town is a created community map by Sayonara for Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
body:
### Welcome to AWP Town! This map is my second big map. Why I called this AWP Town? The plan was to play on 1 ground, there should be some towers, where you can get up via ladder. I was very new to Hammer Editor and I didn't knew how to this. Today I would call myself a professionell map creator in Coutner-Strike: Global Offensive. But wait! You can update the map and add some towers? Yes, I can do that, but my mind says: Don't do that! It would completly destroy my new update and I would build everything again. ### Setup of AWP Town The setup is pretty simple, it's nothing big. There are 2 sides. The CT-Side and the T-Side. You will spawn on of the sides on the middle stage. There are 3 stages. The upper "Welcome Lounge", the middle "Central House" and of course the lowerst "Cellar". I am working a new big update, where are these names represented. I fit the names to the map, so that everything looks fine. Of cource in the cellar, it is dark, you're afraid and full customized ambience. Full of dramatic. More soon! ### FAQ - How long did I need to create this map?
I am quite not sure, but I think, I created this map in less than 2 weeks!

- It was planed, that this map gone popular?
Absolutely not that far.

- Is the new update getting a new map?
I would say so. It is something new, something diffrent. I don't want destroy the first map. Maybe there some few users, which actually like to play on this map. So, there will be a new release!

- How long will be AWP Town supported?
Both maps will be supported till **Summer 2016**

- Where I can download the map? Here, link is here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=394976674 More question? Look below!
### Authors and Contributors Me (Sayonara) and she (Len) created this map. She helped me on this big new update. The new update is begin support a lot of guys! No names here, only in the final release. Wanna checkout the BETA? Sign in: playsfantasy@live.de _(SIGN IN: AWP TOWN BETA AS TITLE)_ ### Support or Contact Do you have any trouble or do you have such great ideas for the new update? Tell me everything. Just Mail me at: playsfantasy@live.de Regards, **Sayonara & Len ãƒ„**
